CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 15, 1952, pg. 14 reads: "Children's Civic Theatre - Last Tuesday night was a gala one for members of the Children's Civic Theatre who sponsored the Grace price production of "The Little Lama Prince" at the Irene Kaufmann Auditorium. Pictured here is the capacity audience of young folk who enjoyed tremendously the excellent play, as done by the professional grown-up cast.  The young fortunates who have season tickets for the remaining three plays are eagerly looking forward to the special Christmas program to be given at Carnegie Music Hall, when an as yet unnamed production will be presented. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of men, women, and children, seated in Irene Kaufmann Auditorium for Children's Civic Theatre production of "The Little Lama Prince"
